Board.name: babyshapes
Board.author: Bruno Coudoin (bruno.coudoin@gcompris.net) / Andre Connes (andre.connes@toulouse.iufm.fr)
Board.title: Complete the puzzle
Board.description: Drag and Drop the shapes on their respective targets
Board.credit: The dog is provided by Andre Connes and released under the GPL
Board.manual: Complete the puzzle by dragging each piece from the set of pieces on the left, to the matching space in the puzzle.
